plugins.name: Polygot
plugins.description: Better Syntax Highlighting.
use: Disable languages with: let g:polyglot_disabled = ['css']

plugins.name: Minimalist
plugins.description: A material color scheme for darker vim.
use: In vimrc: colorscheme minimalist

plugins.name: Monokai Tasty
plugins.description: Sublime Monokai inspired color scheme.
use: In vimrc: colorscheme vim-monokai-tasty

plugins.name: FZF
plugins.description: Fzf File Finder
use: ctrl-p to open
ctrl-x horizontal split
ctrl-v vertical split
ctrl-t new tab

plugins.name: Lightline
plugins.description: A light and configurable statusline/tabline plugin for Vim
use: let g:lightline ={ 'colorscheme': 'wombat'}

plugins.name: Tagbar
plugins.description: Displays tags in a window, ordered by scope
use: ctrl-t to open
:T to open, if open jumps to window

plugins.name: Auto Pairs
plugins.description: Insert or delete brackets, parens, quotes in pair
use: Automatic when installed.

plugins.name: Surround
plugins.description: Quoting/parenthesizing made simple.
use: cs"' | "Hello World" changes to 'Hello World'
cs'<q> | 'Hello World' changes to <q>Hello World</q>
ds' 'Hello World' changes to Hello World

plugins.name: Repeat
plugins.description: Enable repeating supported plugin maps with '.'
use: Allows plugins like surround to work with . operator

plugins.name: Peekaboo
plugins.description: Extends " and @ in normal mode and <CTRL-R> in insert mode so you can see the coontents of the registers.
use: press " or @ for a sidebar to pop up, showing you the contents of your registers.
"add | delete and copy current line into register a.
"ap | paste contents of register a to current line

plugins.name: Easy Motion
plugins.description: Vim motions on speed!
use: shift-j in normal mode | shows characters for jumping below cursor.
shift-k in normal mode | show characters for jumping above cursor.

plugins.name: Matchit
plugins.description: Extends % matching for HTML, LaTeX, and many other languages.
use: allows % to jump from more robust set of tags

plugins.name: ZoomWin
plugins.description: Zoom in/out of windows (toggle between one window and multi-window)
use: <CTRL>-O zooms into current VIM pane or zoom out of it.
CAUTION: Some issues arise when TagBar is open.

plugins.name: Goyo
plugins.description: Distraction-free writing in VIM.
use: :G | toggle Goyo on or off.
let g:goyo_width=100

plugins.name: WindowSwap
plugins.description: Swap your windows without ruining your layout.
use: Go to pane to move, press <leader>ww, go to destination, press <leader>ww

plugins.name: Commentary
plugins.description: Comment stuff out.
use: gc : takes a vim verb to toggle comments
gcc : toggle comment on current line
gc12j : toggle comments from current to 10 down.
gcap : toggle comments for whole paragraph

plugins.name: Solarized Colorscheme
plugins.description: Vim Solarized Color Scheme.
use: colorscheme solarized
let g:solarized_termcolors=256
set background=dark

plugins.name: Palenight Colorscheme
plugins.description: A dark color scheme based off Material Pale Night and onedark.vim.
use: colorscheme palenight
let g:lightline.colorscheme = palenight

plugins.name: Vim Function Object
plugins.description: Enable functions as object you can interact with, daf, cif, etc.
use: daf | delete all function
cif | change in function

plugins.name: Vim Abolish
plugins.description: Enhanced :%Subuvert (change every case of child Children to adult Adults)
use: :%Subvert/child{,ren}/adult{,s}/g | change every case type of child / children to adult / adults

plugins.name: Vim Expand Region
plugins.description: Highlight bigger and bigger objects
use: H | highlight word, highlight in delim, highlight whole line, highlight block
L | highlight less, opposite of H

plugins.name: Vim Targets
plugins.description: Allows things like ci( to target next upcoming ( so you don't need to already be in it.
use: ci( jump to next () group and change what is inside
ca, | delete current csv value and end in insert mode

plugins.name: Completor
plugins.description: Completor is an asynchronous code completion framework for vim8.
use: FZF style search for completion: type hapcommit for HAPLightBulbCommitConnfigurationChange, etc.

plugins.name: Unimpaired
plugins.description: Add [<char>  ]<char> pair for controlls, things like [<space> to insert space above line
use: [<space> insert space above ]<space> insert space below
[o<cmd> to set and unset sytem vars:l (list), n (number), w (wrap), x (cursorline cursorcolumn)
[op | jump into insert with paste, when you escape it will exit paste mode

extra_plugins.name: Ale Linter
extra_plugins.description: Asynchronous linting/fixing for Vim and Language Server Protocol (LSP) integration.
use: :ALEFix | Run through file and attempt to fix mistakes.
:ALEToggle | Turn ALE on or off for the file.
